tweets.content: "No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin or his background or his religion..."

Kobe was a legend on the court and just getting started in what would have been just as meaningful a second act. To lose Gianna is even more heartbreaking to us as parents. Michelle and I send love and prayers to Vanessa and the entire Bryant family on an unthinkable day.

summary: Kobe Bryant's death is a devastating loss for everyone - condolences to all affected families. @JoeBiden and @MichelleObama should be congratulated and given huge congratulations! Congratulations again to my friend. May God bless you both with joy and happiness in your lives now & always. :) 😍 #LoveWins
